mapper.insert: INSERT INTO terms (title, content, necessary, order_no, user_code, apply_at, status) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{necessary}, #{orderNo}, #{userCode}, #{applyAt}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM terms WHERE user_code = #{userCode} and order_no = #{orderNo}
SELECT * FROM terms WHERE user_code = #{user_code} ORDER BY order_no ASC
